name: Pipeshift
headline: Modular Orchestration Platform for Open Source AI
description: Pipeshift is a modular orchestration platform for building with open-source AI components — embeddings, vector databases, LLMs, vision models and audio models — across any cloud or on-prem. Enterprises get to deploy their AI workloads in production faster and more reliably. Additionally, as we see more model and hardware architectures coming in the market, Pipeshift future-proofs the infrastructure investments by offering flexibility through their modular MLOps stack that allows enterprises to bring down their GPU infrastructure costs without any additional engineering efforts on their end.
tags: industry:aiops; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:infrastructure; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Arko C, Founder
founders.description:
CEO @ Pipeshift.
Helping developers fine-tune, distill and deploy open-source LLMs 10x faster.

founders.name: Enrique Ferrao, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Pipeshift. Focused on squeezing out max LLM performance from GPUs

founders.name: Pranav Reddy, Founder
founders.description: CIO @ Pipeshift. Making LLMs go brrrr at Pipeshift

Backed by
![Y combinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bbc08be079c7b014c8ab5_668e5faf2e805895638eb776_yc%20logo%20\(1\).svg)
Build, Deploy and ScaleOpen Source AI
Pipeshift is a modular orchestration platform for building with open-source AI components — embeddings, vector databases, LLMs, vision models and audio models — across any cloud or on-prem.
[Book demo](https://pipeshift.com/<https:/cal.com/arkoc/pipeshift>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd9d77bc5618d15064dee_play2.svg)Watch demo](https://pipeshift.com/<https:/youtu.be/0OBJRfLToMc>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
End-to-end Orchestration
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
100% Cloud Agnostic
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Enterprise-grade Security
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6728b06f4182029c591f47ef_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6728b06f4182029c591f47aa_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6791f076b90459e09be0bb48_deployment%20screennew.webp)
Solutions
AI in Production is more than "low-cost" APIs
Unlike API providers built for experimentation without any privacy, Pipeshift solves for the needs andscale of DevOps/MLOps teams trying to set up production pipelines in-house.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6756c39b19a55ebad1d3db18_frame_1321318531_2x.webp)
Enterprise MLOps Console
Run, manage and control all forms of AI workloads - fine-tune, distill or deploy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6756c3a0c9f6c8b0b5b497f1_group_1597883590_2x.webp)
Multi-cloud Orchestration
In-built auto-scalers, load balancers and schedulers for AI models.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6756c45c261ff7ca01eb8d45_group_1597883594.webp)
K8s Cluster Management
End-to-end control panel for creating and managing K8s clusters anywhere.
Product
Infrastructure-as-a-Service, Redefined.
Pipeshift provides out-of-the-box infrastructure for all the DevOps/MLOps needs for all open-source GenAI workloads, allowing teams to be ready to scale from Day 1.
[Model Fine-tuning](https://pipeshift.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Model Deployment](https://pipeshift.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[K8s Cluster Management](https://pipeshift.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[360° Observability](https://pipeshift.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
Your data but OpenAI's model? Not anymore
Use your own data or model API logs to fine-tune or distill custom models for use cases, without your data ever leaving your infrastructure.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Use custom datasets or LLM logs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Run parallel training experiments
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Track training metrics during jobs
See how
[Schedule demo](https://pipeshift.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/67403705759d4ba060546196_finetune_3x.webp)
Your AI models belong in production
All AI use cases get stuck in the uncertainty of the "Playground Valley". Our platform ensures that all your models get deployed in production.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Auto-scaling enabled on GPUs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
High inference speed and low latency
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Increases reliability and uptime
See how
[Schedule demo](https://pipeshift.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6740370a29cd1ec345314e35_model_deployment_3x.webp)
Create, manage and scale clusters
Managing your infrastructure has never been easier. With Pipeshift's console, you can create, manage and scale your kubernetes clusters in seconds.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
End-to-end cluster and GPU management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Runs on any cloud and on-prem
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Runs on any managed kubernetes layer
See how
[Schedule demo](https://pipeshift.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/674036ffa6ceb53bf8b1af38_cluster_create_3x.webp)
Know all that's going on in production
AI doesn't have to be a black-box. We give you complete view of your models, APIs, GPUs and K8s clusters in production, all on a single console.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Monitor performance and usage of models
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Track resources and clusters across clouds
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Observe clusters, APIs and training jobs
See how
[Schedule demo](https://pipeshift.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673c109a6c89758068778584_usage.webp)
Optimizations
 _Unused GPU capacity? Not anymore._
Pipeshift provides out-of-the-box infrastructure for all the DevOps/MLOps needs for all open-source GenAI workloads, allowing teams to be ready to scale from Day 1.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6795e6b21cade9c15905d893_group_15978836322.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673beb88cd4d105af11e9d19_frame_1597883652_2x.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673beb8257cae776070bea07_frame_1597883651_2x.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/674352ac1de0e95197ddfd02_Other%20Basic%20Stacks%20\(2\).png)
New Model, New Instance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6740382a372eb5bc0696c49b_crossframe.svg)
More models = More GPUs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6740382a372eb5bc0696c49b_crossframe.svg)
Hardly break-even on GPUs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6740382a372eb5bc0696c49b_crossframe.svg)
Pay for unused GPU hours
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6740382a372eb5bc0696c49b_crossframe.svg)
Might need GPU fractioning
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/6732183bd11a0346924726d9_Pipeshift.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/674352ac69536353db6e4892_Pipeshift%20Way%20\(1\).png)
Infinite Models, Same Instance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Hot-swap fine-tuned models
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Zero model overlaps in APIs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
Break-even on your GPUs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eb3d4af2c6a4ea05c66918/673bd7cce7ba3da077ebac0a_check%20mark.svg)
No GPU memory fractioning
Benefits
Most Efficient and Secure way to get your AI models to Production
Pipeshift provides out-of-the-box infrastructure for all the DevOps/MLOps needs for all open-source GenAI workloads, allowing teams to be ready to scale from Day 1.
### Consultation and Strategy
Our team of AI/ML experts understand your business, identify use cases, and recommend the right Al strategy.
### Training and Deployments
Fine-tune or distill open-source models for your use cases and deploy them on any cloud provider and on-prem.
### 24/7 MLOps Support
Dedicated MLOps console, member management, dedicated onboarding and ongoing account management.
### Enterprise-grade security
Open-source models don't need to retrain models for public use, securing your data and customers.
60%
### Cost savings on GPU infra
30x
### Faster time-to-production
6x
### Lower cost than GPT/Claude
55%
### Lower engineering resources
Build on top of the best open source AI models
Future of AI is open-source and Pipeshift helps you to build with the best open-source LLMs.

Benefits
Most Efficient and Secure way to get your AI models to Production
Pipeshift provides out-of-the-box infrastructure for all the DevOps/MLOps needs for all open-source GenAI workloads, allowing teams to be ready to scale from Day 1.
### Consultation and Strategy
Our team of AI/ML experts understand your business, identify use cases, and recommend the right Al strategy.
### Training and Deployments
Fine-tune or distill open-source models for your use cases and deploy them on any cloud provider and on-prem.
### 24/7 MLOps Support
Dedicated MLOps console, member management, dedicated onboarding and ongoing account management.
### Enterprise-grade security
Open-source models don't need to retrain models for public use, securing your data and customers.
60%
### Cost savings on GPU infra
30x
### Faster time-to-production
6x
### Lower cost than GPT/Claude
55%
### Lower engineering resources
Build on top of the best open source AI models
Future of AI is open-source and Pipeshift helps you to build with the best open-source LLMs.

generated_description:
**Pipeshift Summary**

Established in 2024 and based in San Francisco, Pipeshift is a trailblazer in the realm of artificial intelligence, offering a modular orchestration platform designed for interacting with open-source AI components like embeddings, vector databases, language models (LLMs), and more. Its mission? To streamline and enhance the deployment of AI workloads across various infrastructures, whether in the cloud or on-premises.

What's particularly compelling about Pipeshift is its capacity to future-proof infrastructure investments. With the rapid evolution of AI models and hardware, it provides enterprises with a flexible MLOps stack that can significantly reduce GPU infrastructure costs, all while allowing teams to maintain control with minimal engineering overhead. This is a game-changer for businesses looking to deploy AI reliably and quickly.

Right off the bat, Pipeshift distinguishes itself from traditional API providers by catering specifically to the needs of DevOps and MLOps teams that require secure, in-house production pipelines rather than experimentation. Their platform is designed to facilitate everything from model fine-tuning to K8s cluster management, thereby providing a comprehensive end-to-end orchestration solution.

Pipeshift has made strides to ensure their system maintains high security and is entirely cloud-agnostic. Their enterprise-grade features empower users to monitor, manage, and optimize AI models effectively, allowing for high efficiency and an integrated view across all AI operations.

The company comprises a nimble team of 10 and is backed by prominent investors, including Y Combinator, which speaks volumes about its potential in the booming AI sector. Under the leadership of Dalton Caldwell, Pipeshift is geared up for rapid growth within the San Francisco Bay Area.

In a nutshell, if you’re a business ready to take your AI applications from the drawing board to production, Pipeshift is poised to help you do just that—efficiently and securely. For more information, you can visit [Pipeshift’s website](https://pipeshift.com). 

**Key Takeaways:**
- **Founded:** 2024
- **Location:** San Francisco
- **Team Size:** 10 employees
- **Mission:** Modular orchestration platform for open-source AI deployment.
- **Investment:** Y Combinator Batch S24
- **Key Features:** Flexible MLOps stack, end-to-end orchestration, enterprise-grade security.
- **Website:** [pipeshift.com](https://pipeshift.com) 

If you’re looking to innovate in AI with cost efficiency and a robust framework, now might just be the right time to explore what Pipeshift has to offer.
